channel.title: Include File Errors. READ HERE IF YOU HAVE THESE ERRORS
channel.description:
First of all, i would like this as a sticky as these are common errors that people will now know how to fix. After reading at least 5 posts about this issue and am tired of post "Do you have SRL Installed?". So please sticky.
Now most people have come up with these errors and there is a fix for this issue. And these errors are: [code]Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Cooking.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Crafting.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Firemaking.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Fishing.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Magic.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Mining.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Prayer.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Ranging.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Runecrafting.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Smithing.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\WoodCutting.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Agility.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Farming.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Fletching.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Herblore.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Slayer.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Thieving.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Hunting.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Fighting.scar does not exist.[/code]
And to fix this error you have to Download SRL. You can download SRL from [url=http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/offical-srl-download-t3410.html?t=3410]here[/url]. Follow the instructions/step-by-step guide to download and install your latest SRL. Also, the SRL do not contain viruses, spyware or malicous software.
Thank you for you kind attention for reading, Dudeofthed!

item.title: Include File Errors. READ HERE IF YOU HAVE THESE ERRORS
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Mod Adam:

[quote]First of all, i would like this as a sticky as these are common errors that people will now know how to fix.

Im afraid you don’t make the choice about it being stickied or not, and also there is already a sticky about getting includes…

EDIT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,19933.0.html[/quote]
But that could just be to tell people to get SRL. Same as this i know but some people might think, oh well. But this is showing what happens if you do not have SRL included and you come up with these errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Include File Errors. READ HERE IF YOU HAVE THESE ERRORS

@dudeofthed wrote:

First of all, i would like this as a sticky as these are common errors that people will now know how to fix. After reading at least 5 posts about this issue and am tired of post “Do you have SRL Installed?”. So please sticky.

Now most people have come up with these errors and there is a fix for this issue. And these errors are:

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Cooking.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\skill\Crafting.scar does not exist. And to fix this error you have to Download SRL. You can download SRL from here. Follow the instructions/step-by-step guide to download and install your latest SRL. Also, the SRL do not contain viruses, spyware or malicous software.
